mapper.sql: id, EquipmentId, Number, ParameterA, ParameterB, ParameterC, ParameterD, Createuser, Createtime, Modifyuser, Modifytime
mapper.select:
select
from SensorInfo where EquipmentId = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by Number asc
mapper.delete: delete s from SensorInfo s left join equipment e on s.EquipmentId = e.id left join ControlHost c on e.controlHostId = c.id where c.id = #{controlHostId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert:
insert into SensorInfo (EquipmentId, Number, Createuser, Createtime, Modifyuser, Modifytime) values
(#{item.equipmentid}, #{item.number}, #{item.createuser}, #{item.createtime},#{item.modifyuser},#{item.modifytime})

id,

mapper.update:
update SensorInfo
EquipmentId = #{equipmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ParameterA = #{parametera,jdbcType=REAL},
ParameterB = #{parameterb,jdbcType=REAL},
ParameterC = #{parameterc,jdbcType=REAL},
ParameterD = #{parameterd,jdbcType=REAL},
Createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Modifyuser = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SensorInfo set EquipmentId = #{equipmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ParameterA = #{parametera,jdbcType=REAL}, ParameterB = #{parameterb,jdbcType=REAL}, ParameterC = #{parameterc,jdbcType=REAL}, ParameterD = #{parameterd,jdbcType=REAL}, Createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Modifyuser = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
